Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    AttackAction is a class which used by player to attack the enemies, it extends from its parent class Action class.
    AttackShellAction
    AttackShellAction is a class which used to smash Koopaâ€™s shell when Koopa is defeated.
    BuyAction
    BuyAction is an action that allows the player to use coin to purchase items from the toad.
    ConsumeAction
    This class is use to update playerâ€™s status and remove magical items from players inventory whenever player consumes the item.
    DrinkWaterAction
    this class is to update actor's status upon drinking water enemies drink water directly from the fountain while player drinks water from bottle
    FireAttackAction
    An action that allows the actor to attack with fire (i.e., dropping a fire on target's location) It will be available to the user on the console once the Player has the capability of FIRE_ATTACK This capability can be gain by consuming a fire flower
    GetBottleAction
    this class is use to enable player to obtain bottle from the toad add bottle into player's inventory
    JumpAction
    JumpAction is a class that allows the actor to jump to the jumpable ground.
    PickCoinAction
    This class extends the Action class to allow player to pick up coins add coin value to wallet balance This class has association relationship with the Coin class as there will be a coin attribute initialised in the PickCoinAction constructor so that it knows which coin (of what value) is picked.
    ResetAction
    ResetAction is a class that allows the user to reset the game.
    SpeakAction
    SpeakAction class is a class that allows the actor to have a conversation with toad (friendly NPC) to get some useful information It is extends from its parent class Action.
    TakeWaterAction
    This class is used to enable player to refil water from fountains into water bottle Hence, whenever the user perform this action, it will add that particular water instance on player's bottle
    TeleportAction
    TeleportAction is an action that allows the actor to teleport to the desired location.
    VictoryAction
    VictoryAction class is a class when Player kill Bowser(obtain a key form it), player can interact with Princess Peach to end this game.
